function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preparedness for infectious disease epidemics","Impact":"Rapid escalation of cases, economic downfall, social disruption","Mitigation":"Investment in research, preparedness plans, international collaboration","Technologies":"Vaccines, monitoring systems, early warning systems","People":"Global population, governments, public health agencies","Owner":"Governments, public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Disregard for climate change as a pressing political priority","Impact":"Increased economic recovery time, growing disruptions, high cost of halting climate change","Mitigation":"Increased political urgency, financial investment, reduction of greenhouse gas emissions","Technologies":"Renewable energy, carbon capture technology, climate monitoring systems","People":"Global population, governments, environmental agencies","Owner":"Governments, environmental agencies, private sector"}]}
